pages.text: $(item)The Intern$(0) is there to replace that tedious task of manually building and upgrading the factory structure. Not only can it build but also, with no extra payment, validate an existing structure.

When in one of the build modes, $(item)The Intern$(0) will take the factory blocks from your inventory and place them into the world. The tier of factory built will depend on the mode that $(item)The Intern$(0) is in.
$(li)The tool should be used on a pre-placed Heart.$(li)The current mode can be cycled by left-clicking in the air.
Why bark when you have a dog.
